long: Meaning: to "be safe" (in mind, body or estate); figuratively, to "be" (causatively, "make") "completed"; by implication, to "be friendly"; by extension, to "reciprocate" (in various applications).  Usage: make amends, (make an) end, finish, full, give again, make good, (re-) pay (again), (make) (to) (be at) peace(-able), that is perfect, perform, (make) prosper(-ous), recompense, render, requite, make restitution, restore, reward, Ã— surely.  Source: a primitive root;
